TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509ChainStatus extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides a simple structure for storing X509 chain status and error information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This structure is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainStatus%2A> property.
## Examples The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. The output depends on the certificate you select.
[!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Specifies the status of the X509 chain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The flag can be used to determine the details of a chain error.
## Examples The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. The output depends on the certificate you select.
[!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Specifies a description of the value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is a localized string that provides a description of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainStatus%2A> enumeration.
## Examples The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. The output depends on the certificate you select.
[!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]
